Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and value, it is worth $15,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $12,000. This offer reflects my commitment to ensuring that you receive the best possible value while maximizing the return on my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Kind regards, Alice. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
